home_page.follow_mass_desc1: 🤩 Subscribe to dozens of profiles in an instant
home_page.follow_mass_desc2: 👀 Vinties will come and subscribe back
home_page.follow_mass_desc3: 💸 Boost your sales with these potential buyers

ad_management_page.auto_upload_desc:
🔌 Vinted + Google



🤖 Repost automatically the programmed ads that you have several times


⚙ Up to 10 programmable ads


👍 Avoid time-consuming and repetitive tasks
ad_management_page.clear_ads_desc:
🔌 Vinted



🗑 Deletes all your sold ads


🌊 Remove all ads from your profile if you want to clean your profile


👉 Manage your ads easily and stay focused
ad_management_page.ad_refresh_desc:
🔌 Vinted



🔄 Refreshes defined ads to place them again at the top of the list on Vinted


🎳 Refreshes all ads of your profile
ad_management_page.ad_refresh_func_desc:
You are about to refresh your ads.
You should not do this too often and let the algorithm of Vinted work for you.
We recommend you to refresh yours ads every 3 to 5 days.
In our case, we refresh our shop every week.

Do you want to proceed?

seretariat_page.process_mails_descL:
💰 Centralizes transactions in a single file


⚙ Set the parameters for the pop-up e-mails you want to delete


📨 Clean up your mailbox


📥 Centralization of mondial relay codes in a file
seretariat_page.process_mails_descR:
🔌 Vinted + Google



📄 Collects all shipping labels of sold items


📦 Adds a predefined thank-you message to put inside the parcel


🖨️ Print shipping labels if a printer is connected
seretariat_page.del_conv_desc:
🔌 Vinted


⚠️ Deletes conversations older than the defined number of months


👍 Don't let yourself be invaded by dozens of discussions where the buyer doesn't pay


✍️ Automatically writes reviews


💫 Customizable reviews

accounting_graphs_page.wrong_date_desc: The selected date is later than today, which is not allowed. We cannot predict the future!
accounting_graphs_page.expt_months_desc1: 🗓️ Exports data for all completed months since your chosen date.
accounting_graphs_page.expt_months_desc2: This feature also includes graph plotting for visualizing sales trends
accounting_graphs_page.expt_months_desc3: and saves your Vinted transactions on a worksheet
accounting_graphs_page.expt_trims_desc1: 📊 Exports comprehensive data for all completed trimesters since
accounting_graphs_page.expt_trims_desc2: your selected date. This feature not only generates graphs to visualize
accounting_graphs_page.expt_trims_desc3: your results but also saves your Vinted transactions neatly in a worksheet
accounting_graphs_page.expt_month_desc1: 📅 Exports data for any completed month of your choice.
accounting_graphs_page.expt_month_desc2: Ensure that the month is finished for this feature to work effectively

accounting_graphs_page.prev_month_desc2: completed month based on the current date

informations_page.pictures_desc2: Take photos from a distance because they appear cropped on Vinted. This way, they will be the right size. Ensure consistency in your profile's item presentation. Always use the same background or a specific object in the first photo to personalize your profile.
informations_page.clear_descriptions_desc1: Use simple, list-style descriptions, and add emojis. Rate the item's condition out of 10 and summarize its key features. This will make your listing clear and high-quality, inspiring confidence in buyers. Descriptions and photos reflect the item's condition. Well-crafted and well-written descriptions show that you've taken care of your item, attracting buyers to your shop.
informations_page.follow_mass_desc1: Subscribe to many other accounts, and they will subscribe back to you. This will help you gain potential buyers as they will be notified when you post a new item. Plus, what's better than having an account with dozens or even hundreds of followers to boost your credibility?
informations_page.follow_mass_desc2: If you find this strategy tedious, you can automate it with Follow Mass. 🚀📈
informations_page.thank_you_title: 💌 Thank You with a Personal Note
informations_page.thank_you_desc1: Don't forget to include a thank-you note in the packages you send. You can write it by hand for a personal touch or print it for convenience.
informations_page.thank_you_desc2: This helps build customer loyalty by offering them a personalized and warm experience. They'll be more inclined to follow your account, make more purchases from you, and even recommend your shop to their friends and family. It's a great way to create lasting connections! 🤝🛍️
informations_page.buy_printer_desc1: Unlock the automatic printing feature for labels and also enjoy the convenience of printing thank-you message lists. It's super handy! 📃✅
informations_page.free_scotch_desc1: Use the money you've saved with Coupert to buy tape in bulk.
informations_page.online_bank_desc1: Minimize your costs and digitize your finances to the fullest. There's no need to hire an accountant or secretary at the beginning since you won't have the means. We've automated a significant part of the accounting to streamline this task. 📊💼🖥️
informations_page.small_warehouse_desc1: Dedicate a part of your home 🏠 to your business, and it will naturally expand. This allows you to separate your business from other activities in your home. Organize and sort your items for optimal logistics. 📈💼🧹
informations_page.id_verif_as_pro_title: 🔍 Verify Your Identity as a Professional Seller
informations_page.id_verif_as_pro_desc1: At some point, we could no longer withdraw our money from Vinted and had to verify that we were a legitimate registered business. Even though we already had professional status on Vinted, we had to obtain a document to confirm our identity. As an individual seller, a simple ID card is sufficient. Initially, it wasn't bothersome, and we continued to sell as usual. When our
informations_page.id_verif_as_pro_desc3: we tried to retrieve our money by providing several documents, but
informations_page.id_verif_as_pro_desc5: After several weeks of research, I finally found the appropriate document.
informations_page.id_verif_as_pro_desc7: , no need to pay for services that won't provide the right document. Here is the precious website:
informations_page.avoid_ban_title: 🚫 Avoid Getting Banned - This Advice Is Priceless
informations_page.avoid_ban_desc1: Firstly, regularly back up your listings using our app's functionality.
informations_page.avoid_ban_desc2: Now, let me tell you why we got banned from Vinted. Simply because we used PayPal to accommodate customers when they wanted to add items to their existing order. Instead of deleting everything and creating a new listing from scratch, we offered to accept a payment and add the item to their order.
informations_page.avoid_ban_desc4: Use our feature to create bundles as a professional seller and
informations_page.avoid_ban_desc5: cancel the sale in all cases
informations_page.avoid_ban_desc6: if you want to modify the bundle.
informations_page.overview_title: Here, you'll find our shared experiences and the issues we've encountered.
informations_page.overview_work_desc1: This is probably the most important advice. The goal of developing a second source of income is to gain more freedom, not the other way around. At the beginning, you'll need to work extensively, even though our app significantly reduces the time spent on repetitive tasks. Once you reach the point where you can make purchases without waiting for payment, you can start organizing your business by limiting the time you invest in it. The true power of money is the ability to choose how you spend your time. You'll need to set limits to endure. You need to work hard but, more importantly, work smart. That's why we created this app, to reduce the workload. I believe experiencing this feeling is essential to understand how important this advice is.
informations_page.overview_work_desc2: Take Your Business to the Next Level
informations_page.overview_work_desc3: Find an item that sells well and that you can acquire in large quantities. Use our automatic relisting feature, and you're good to go. You won't have to do anything else except deliver the packages. Make sure the items are nearly identical because the app reuses the same photos.
informations_page.overview_work_desc5: Never share the file containing your Gmail account password. It can be decrypted by a developer. The data is not encrypted but only encoded. Encryption does not allow automatic login. The only private information that the application stores locally, on your machine only, is your email address and API password. If you do not want to save anything, you will need to authenticate each time you launch the application. The _vinted_fr_session cookie is used to authenticate with Vinted servers. It is only valid for a certain time based on activity on the site. You must renew it each time the application requests it. It is very long to prevent 'bruteforce' attempts by hackers. 🔒🔑💻
informations_page.overview_story_title: We are two brothers passionate about the world of business and technology. As we began our engineering studies, we decided to start our business in the online selling field. We specialize in buying and reselling Nintendo consoles and related video games. 🎮💼 Let us tell you our story...
informations_page.overview_story_desc1: First, we invested our small savings, about 400€ 💰. As we made sales, we realized how time-consuming this activity is and how easily it eats up our free time ⏰. Between preparation, shipping, and receiving packages, we were overwhelmed. Not to mention logistics, accounting, and listing items. All of this requires a lot of work 💪. That's why, with my brother, I decided to create an application that would automate most of the repetitive and error-prone tasks 🤖.
informations_page.overview_story_desc2: So, I got to work by starting to search for what exists in the market. I found very little content on this topic in France and abroad. So, I decided to create a bot that performs clicks on behalf of the user, like all the bots in the market. Unfortunately, it was very slow, and the code wasn't robust 💻. As soon as Vinted made any changes, everything had to be redone 🔄.
informations_page.overview_story_desc3: I decided to learn more about the web and networks, and I discovered that Vinted has a private API 🔒. After many unsuccessful days, I finally managed to understand how it worked and authenticate with our professional account. From there, everything fell into place. I developed many ultra-fast features that are unrivaled in this field ⚡. Our application is the only one that integrates this, making it
informations_page.overview_story_desc5: The launch of this application was not easy at all, but we are proud to be able to bring it to the market for the benefit of as many people as possible 🚀. We strive to make it as comprehensive as possible. Please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or specific requests; we will be delighted to assist you ✉️🤝.
informations_page.affiliation_title: Discover these affiliate links to earn up to €170 and save just as much by supporting us. It's a win-win partnership! 🌟💰
informations_page.affiliation_coupert_desc1: Save money online by automatically finding discount codes, special offers, and benefiting from cashback and a daily reward system on thousands of partner sites. Simplify your online shopping with Coupert! 💳🛍️
informations_page.affiliation_coupert_desc2: €10 for each of you if you create an account on the iPhone app with our link and spend €30 within 60 days on one of the 15,000 partner sites.
informations_page.affiliation_coupert_desc3: For our part, Coupert has allowed us to save around fifty euros in less than six months. By logging in every day, you can earn €120 a year, not to mention cashback and daily missions.
informations_page.affiliation_ali_desc1: Discover a global online marketplace with a wide selection of competitively priced products. Buy directly from manufacturers and sellers worldwide and explore exciting deals on AliExpress! 🌐🛒
informations_page.affiliation_ali_desc2: €4 for the referee, €2 for the referrer
informations_page.affiliation_ali_desc3: Personally, we have ordered stylus pens, cases for Nintendo consoles, contacted sellers, and entered into partnerships that allowed us to obtain unbeatable prices. We were able to negotiate prices with several sellers with whom we frequently do business. We have always received the products we ordered.
informations_page.affiliation_boursorama_desc1: Boursorama is an online bank offering a comprehensive range of banking and financial services, including the ability to trade stocks and financial instruments online. Benefit from competitive fees and convenient services with Boursorama! 💳🏦
informations_page.affiliation_boursorama_desc2: ¤ + €80 minimum for a subscription, which can go up to €120 depending on the current offers for the referred party and €30 for the referrer ¤ + €50 for changing banks with EasyMove
informations_page.affiliation_boursorama_desc3: Since purchasing our first ETFs and with regular investments, we have €4,058 in the stock market for a total purchase of €3,479, resulting in a profit of 16%.
informations_page.affiliation_boursorama_desc4: We have a youth savings account, a long-term savings account, and a current account with a bank card since the beginning of 2023, and we haven't paid a single euro to Boursorama except for stock market orders. It is truly the cheapest bank in France, and their app is very intuitive. For people who primarily pay online or with a card and don't need a dedicated branch, it's the perfect bank.
